brainly_data.question:
38)
A_____________ is the distance from crest to crest in a sound wave.

A.) magnetic wave
B.) wavelength
C.) quasar

39)
Doppler technology is used to predict the weather.

True
False




40)
This scientist suggested that at one time all of the continents were joined in one big piece. He named the single land mass Pangea and called the process continental drift. Select the correct answer.

A.) Harry Hess
B.) Alfred Wegener
C.) Charles Darwin



41)
The plates of the earth are supported by the mantle.

True
False

42)
The energy to move the earth’s plates comes from the crust.

True
False


43)
Moving plates can form both mountains and valleys.

True
False




44) Heat flow that involves particles touching one another is called:
A.) radiation
B.) conduction
C.) convection
D.) mechanics
E.) condensation



45) Heat transfer that takes place as a result of currents in liquids and gases is called:
A.) radiation
B.) conduction
C.) convection
D.) mechanics
E.) condensation
brainly_data.subject: Biology
